column5: Navigate the dynamic digital economy with this immersive programme at Southampton. Grasp the newest business tactics and tech trends.Our academic team's outstanding research shapes your learning journey. Whether you're aiming to launch a digital startup or integrate innovations into current enterprises, this is your foundation. Benefit from exclusive masterclasses hosted by digital business frontrunners. This degree combines core business principles with Southampton's world-class expertise in Web Science. Your learning is enhanced by our close ties with digital industry leaders and entrepreneurs.Course structureThis is a full-time master’s course. You’ll study for 12 months, from September to the following September.
